name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: G RTF: Plain to Rich Text

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: GRTF is Rich Text Format for Google Forms, Twitter, and other non-RTF text boxes... This version is dedicated to #LJTECHi3.
